content:
ApplicationUpgradeState.RollingForwardPending Field

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

In this Article

Indicates that the upgrade to the target application type version is pending user input. The MoveNextApplicationUpgradeDomainAsync(ApplicationUpgradeProgress) is used to move the upgrade forward.

RollingForwardPending
Returns
ApplicationUpgradeState

To be added.
